name: 物理化學實驗（二）
description: 使學生熟悉化學實驗技巧，並且與課本基本原理能互相驗證。
goals: To establish basic knowledge of physical chemistry lab
To solve problem of this topic
To conduct independent thinking on this topic
syllabus:
There will be 10 experiments in this course, the titles are following:

1\. A colorimetric chemical kinetic experiment

2\. Persulfate-iodide clock reaction by initial rates method (I)

3\. Persulfate-iodide clock reaction by initial rates method (II)Bui

4\. A kinetic study for the reaction of ferricyanide and ascorbic acid.

5\. Inversion of sucrose.

6\. Kinetics of a diffusion controlled heterogeneous reaction by titration

7\. A preliminary understanding of ESR and NMR

8\. Atomic spectra of two-electron systems: He and Hg

9\. Build-up a simple spectrometer

10\. Numerical solutions for Schrodinger's equation

11.Theoretical calculation for studying chemical bonding and properties
